attributes.review: very disappointing, i expected more of this. i had this app for months, expecting an update for it to improve, but none came. i have decided to delete it and never again download it. my wifi is fast and the app is very slow, even on my coworker's phones.

I tried to give ducks about this app but so far it was as disappointing as dealing with a jerk at work. So far, terrible and disappointing
